text:
<https://css-tricks.com/using-the-web-speech-api-for-multilingual-translations/>

Not gonna lie, when you start using one of the default voices then switch to one of Google’s… it is an insane change
even if you switch to the italian google voice and write english, it sounds like someone imitating an italian accent speaking english
lol the “itsa” part is why i was like it sounds like an imitation because I’m like, do they actually do that or is that a stereotype

mhhhh, do you have any trouble with italians?
Because I am. :angry:
sorry Guido, that was not appropriate

:joy:
It’s not a problem mate, was joking
but you’re right about our accent when speaking english
or, at least, about the 80% of italians
well i am German so, since we sound silly ourselfs talking English...
is worse when we speak german

I think english speakers speaking german must come off hilarious. The way german sounds to us - tends to sound dark and gothic, but that might just be because for a lot of us our first real encountering with the german language is bands like rammstein

So we probably have a bunch of idiots over there trying to talk in low voices sounding rediculous
